short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search free and paid multimedia assets such as Images, Vectors, Videos, SFXs, Models etc. across multiple sites with just 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a graphic designer, web designer, content creator, digital marketer or video editor looking to skyrocket your productivity and save time? Look no further! With 1 Click Asset Search, simply type your query once and search across all your selected sites in one go. Whether you're crafting a stunning website, designing eye-catching graphics, producing engaging videos, or managing social media content, 1 Click Asset Search is your go-to tool for finding the perfect multimedia assets. Download now and transform the way you search for assets!

Key Features:
* Comprehensive Asset Library: Variety of asset types to choose from, each having its own set of websites, including - Images, Illustrations, Vectors, Icons, Sound Effects, Video Footage, 3D Models, Fonts, Color Palettes etc.
* Smart Site Selection: Your selected sites for each asset type are saved in browser storage, so you donâ€™t have to keep checking or unchecking them. Simply switch between asset types, and your preferences are automatically applied!
* License Snippets: Get essential license information at a glance, including whether commercial use is allowed and if attribution is required or optional. Direct links to the license page for each site.
* User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI making it extremely easy to use, regardless of experience level.
* Privacy: Works 100% locally. Nothing leaves your browser.

How to Use:
1. Open the Extension: Click on the extension's icon in your browser's toolbar to open it in sidepanel/sidebar.
2. Select Asset Type: Choose one of the asset type in order to display sites under it.
3. Select Websites: Select your preferred sites for the selected asset. Your choices will be saved locally for future searches.
4. Enter Your Search Query: Type your query in the search box and hit Enter.
5. Results: Your selected sites will be opened in new tabs with you search query.
